annonsrubrik: IT Manager to Aaro Systems, Stockholm
annonstext:
Do you want to utilize your experiences from IT Ops and Cloud technology and at the same time grow as a leader? Aaro Systems, a Swedish product company that develop a complete system for group accounting, reporting and analysis are now looking for an IT Manager to lead their IT department at their HQ in Stockholm. 
 
At Aaro Systems, you get the chance to work with the complex reality of the largest business groups in the country – an exciting, challenging and global setting. Above all, it is incredibly rewarding and enjoyable. Sounds interesting? Read more and apply today!
 
The role
As IT Manager your main objective is to lead and develop the IT department and the related products and services they provide. Today your team consists of eight technicians (and growing), which you have full personnel responsibility for. You are also responsible for the IT department budget. As IT Manager, you will be accountable for executing and enabling the set strategy for Aaro, and integrating policies across several departments, as well as contribute to strategic policy decisions.
 
In the position you will represent the IT department in different product boards and support the sale organization with technical know-how. A lot of emphasis will be put on managing and developing the Aaro SaaS-solution and therefore a close and rich collaboration with the development department is essential. 
 
To work at Aaro Systems gives you both freedom and a high level of involvement. This is a learning environment where employees are encouraged to continuously develop and share knowledge. As IT Manager you will be a part of the management team and report directly to the COO. The position is fulltime and placed at Aaro Systems HQ in central Stockholm.
 
Is this you?
To be successful in the role, we believe that you have a couple of years of experience as a manager for a technical team within infrastructure or IT operations. Another possible background could be a couple of years of experience as a team lead within high-tech cloud solutions. Further on, we see that you have knowledge about IT Infrastructure design and/or architecture (both on-prem and cloud) and experience working with Azure, AWS or similar public cloud service and monitoring. 
 
Earlier experience from ISO 27001, consultancy- or pre-sale roles, experience from a product company within financial software and/or technical university degree gives extra merit(s). 
 
We put much emphasis on personal qualities in this recruitment process. To be successful in the role, it is important that you have strong communication skills with an ability to adapt to different target groups. You can work with strategies and are likely to initiate new activities and explore new technologies. Further on, you have great problem-solving skills and the ability to engage and inspire your team. Fluent in English, both in speech and writing is mandatory.
 
In this recruitment, a final step is a mandatory background screening.  
 
Do you want to know more?
In this process Aaro Systems is working with Level Recruitment. To apply, please click at the apply button. If you have any questions please contact recruitment consultant FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  TELEPHONENO . We will read applications continuously so please send us your application today!
